com.b2international.snowowl.core.users

Interface IUserManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileUserManager, LdapUserManager

    public interface IUserManager
    User manager interface to handle users.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUser(User user, Collection<Role> roles)
      Adds a user to the store with the provided credentials.
      User getUser(String username)
      Returns the User instance associated and identified by the passed in unique username.
      Set<User> getUsers() 
      boolean removeUser(String username)
      Removes a registered user identified by the passed in username.

    • Method Detail

      • getUsers

        Set<User> getUsers()
        Returns:
        The immutable and unmodifiable set of registered users.

      • addUser

        void addUser(User user,
             Collection<Role> roles)
        Adds a user to the store with the provided credentials.
        Parameters:
        hashSet -
        username - the username.
        password - the password.
        roles - set of roles.

      • removeUser

        boolean removeUser(String username)
        Removes a registered user identified by the passed in username. Returns false if no user has been registered with this username otherwise it returns true.
        Parameters:
        username - the unique username.
        Returns:
        true if the user removal was successful otherwise returns false.

      • getUser

        User getUser(String username)
        Returns the User instance associated and identified by the passed in unique username.
        Parameters:
        username - the unique username of the user.
        Returns:
        a User instance identified by the passed in username. Returns with null if no user exists with this username.
